summary: Dynamic, highly technical, hands-on International Entrepreneur and Business Consultant with a career path that started as an entrepreneur, transformed in to a business consultant, further evolved in to an academic consultant, and finally now focused as a public policy advisor. Successfully launched companies in diverse markets for natural/specialty food products. Partner with international businesses throughout 28 countries to forge new business opportunities for the company. Build strong teams including leaders for new product development, communications, marketing, and sales divisions. Clearly define strategy for international opportunities, pricing, distribution, new product development, and market penetration. Advocate for the development of public policy, acting as a trusted advisor to several different industries. As a public policy advisor, championed several other projects focused on societal development, human resources support, industrial development, energy, medical, and agricultural initiatives. Explore academic consulting opportunities and optimize evolution patterns for academic growth and knowledge expansion activities.

profile_positions.description:
♦	Launched a Group of Companies in diverse markets in food and natural products, achieving market shares in Egypt of 80% in bee products market, 70% in health products market, 9% in Molasses, and 12% in Jam market.
♦	Co-found and further develop business partnerships for Imtenan Health Shops for Natural Products. Successfully open 38 shops, 160 products, and approximately 45% market share.
♦	Grew the workforce from 10 employees to 600 employees, and from 100 m2 of real estate assets to more than 10,000 m2 in 2017. 
♦	Restructure Sales & market Organization to increase coverage from 200 shops in Cairo only, to over 10,000 Shops all over the country visited weekly.
♦	Launched company's products in 28 countries by developing relationships with distributors and agents geographically distributed in Europe, Asia, USA and MENA Region. 
♦	Strategically developed teams for New Product Development, Market Communication Team, and realizing marketing leadership in diverse markets.
♦	Completely re-structured the Supply and Quality Control Work Process Doubling Profitability and maintain increased supply capacity and capability by 70% annually.
♦	Oversee the construction projects for several manufacturing complexes for the company. Reduce unnecessary budgetary spending by 33% on average for each project.
♦	Rotated through several different roles in a family owned business. Roles included production, accounting, administration, sales, and purchasing.
profile_positions.title: Entrepreneur and Founder of group of companies

profile_positions.description:
